== Introduction ==
The purpose of the Newsletter Team of the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ArizonaTeam|Ubuntu-Arizona Loco]]</nowiki> is to keep the AZ loco members up to date on breaking news concerning Ubuntu, Open Source and our own Ubuntu-Arizona Loco.
== How to Contribute ==
* If you are interested in submitting an article for publication, please contact Todd at toddc@azloco.com by clicking on this link. Your submission will then be considered for a future edition.
== Projects/Archives ==
* Collecting and organizing items of interest to the loco members, publication via email and the Newsletter wiki. Current and archived Ubuntu-Arizona Newsletters can be found at <nowiki>[[ArizonaTeam-Newsletters]]</nowiki>.
